message:
‎"... drones were being used inland away from border control functions... Miami-Dade announced the arrival of a 16-pound micro drone T-Hawk surveillance model... There have even been reports about 'wasp' drones to sniff out Wi-FI networks... these drones may be used in order to further the police state & restrict free speech... 'U.K. police have used micro UAVs to monitor "anti-social behavior"'..."

http://dprogram.net/2011/01/30/micro-drones-to-fly-surveillance-missions-over-the-u-s/
